article.text: It was also further rocked by a Nov 26 NATO strike on two Pakistani border posts that killed 24 soldiers, infuriating the country's powerful military which also has a tense relationship with Zardari. FM: Kazakhstan urges to enhance international involvement in resolving Nagorno-Karabakh conflict Azerbaijan, Lithuania foreign ministers discuss Nagorno-Karabakh settlement Minister: Instability in Syria does not hamper Pan-Arab gas pipeline project Azerbaijan interested in supplying oil to Baltic markets - minister Azerbaijan proposes to begin work on main peace agreement on Nagorno-Karabakh conflict OSCE statement: Azerbaijani, Armenian presidents ready to continue negotiations on Nagorno-Karabakh
